statements.query: MATCH (n:DynamoDBTable)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AWSAccount{id: {AWS_ID}}) WHERE n.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH n LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DETACH DELETE (n) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted

MATCH (g:DynamoDBGlobalSecondaryIndex)<-[:GLOBAL_SECONDARY_INDEX]-(:DynamoDBTable)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AWSAccount{id: {AWS_ID}}) WHERE g.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH g LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DETACH DELETE (g) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted

MATCH (:DynamoDBGlobalSecondaryIndex)<-[r:GLOBAL_SECONDARY_INDEX]-(:DynamoDBTable)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AWSAccount{id: {AWS_ID}}) WHERE r.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH r LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
